website_summaries.verdict: The fashionable Mobile Edge Milano provides a sophisticated way for professional women to carry their ultraportable laptops.
cons: shoulder straps limit the size of laptop you can carry

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this tote bag. It fits everything I need for work (including my laptop) without looking like a boring laptop bag. The quality is really good and I actually think it looks better in person. I have been using it for a couple of months, and there is no substantial wear visible. The reason I gave it four stars is that the red lining of the bag tends to rub off on items (white phone case, gray umbrella), so be careful with anything light in color. Would highly recommend to the fashion conscious.
customer_reviews.author: kittenlover

customer_reviews.title: Too big and looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: This bag is ridiculously large, made of cheap material, and expensive for what you're getting. I was looking for a stylish and professional bag for school/work (to fit my 13" Zenbook Prime, notepad, & misc items), but this bag turned out to be gigantic and cheaply made. The croc pattern looks ok, but the way the bag feels is how you can immediately tell the poor quality. Most importantly, it is too big for everyday use. At 5'2.5" I looked incredibly disproportionate with it and even on my taller coworkers it did not look flattering. As for travelling purposes, why would you want to lug something so large and heavy when you can just use regular suitcases?
customer_reviews.author: Desda

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a chique laptop bag for quite sometime now and this one is everything I was looking for. It's beautiful, very fashionable and practical. Spacious enough to keep your papers organized next to your safely covered laptop and has a very nice detachable wristlet for a charger/external hard disk/mouse...etc. There's even a pocket for your cell phone or PDA. As for the exterior, that's just amazing. The croc texture gives the bag such elegance. Fashionistas will definitely fall in love with this bag. I know I am!!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Salama

customer_reviews.title: been looking for the perfect bag in awhile
customer_reviews.text: My hubby got this for me as a early V-gift since I needed a new laptop bag. It's the perfect size for my 15.4" laptop and so very practical! I love all the compartments. You will not regret the buy. It's exactly what I was looking for! Great gift for a lady who just got a promotion or a wifey looking for a great bag to take with her for work and travel!
customer_reviews.author: Haikela

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag after a lot of research and absolutely love it! I was so sick of buyer the cheaper quality bags only to have the straps break because I carry a lot of work around in them. I've had it for awhile now and it looks brand new. I also use it for my carry-on when I travel. This was a great deal for the money and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C. Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I think this bag is great! Not only is it practical but also beautifully stylish. The red interior pops and adds a bit of sass. My laptop fits in nicely and there is also plenty of room for neccessary extras (battery charger, documents, etc). The quality of this Milano is excellent, made sturdy and built to last. You will not only enjoy your purchase but be the envy of your friends.
customer_reviews.author: SweetKit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect...
customer_reviews.text: It has the perfect amount of pockets & space inside. I'm able to fit my laptop, power brick, mouse, and a couple of folders with some room to spare. I was a bit concerned with a previous posters indication of "not enough padding" - but as long as your aren't throwing your bag around it's OK. Like a previous poster, I love the red lining to easily find items. Be careful though, the red has rubbed of & stained my headphones. (The only reason I rated at 4 stars)
customer_reviews.author: MGibson

customer_reviews.title: Mobile Edge The Milano Small- 15.4-Inch PC/17-Inch MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: I have found it doesn't open wide enough at the top to find things. I had to removed items to get to other items in the bag. It is limited to what you can put in it as well. My white cords are now pink due to color bleeding from the fabric inside the bad. The straps are somewhat narrow which puts a strain on the shoulder especially when walking through an airport. I do like being able to get rid of the PC roller bag and replacing it with this one.
customer_reviews.author: MountainKat

customer_reviews.title: All went back easily but my wife is still disappointed 3 weeks after ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item 3 times and all of them have been a completely different canvas computer bag. All went back easily but my wife is still disappointed 3 weeks after her birthday. Seems to be stocking issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Regehr

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bag that was: 1. Firm and could stand by itself 2. Business formal 3. Fashionable 4. Simplistic 5. Durable (by this I mean the handles) 6. Reasonable price And this bag fits all the criteria wonderfully. I feel so confident holding this bag with my pencil/mini skirt, fashionable blazer and high heels. Its simple design looks modern and has attitude. Best choice I've made so far. The only thing that I don't like about this bag is the name of the brand - Mobile Edge? Sounds like a mobile phone service, which makes my bag sound like a complimentary item. Aside from that, I love this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Trang Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: New Owner
customer_reviews.text: This bag is absolutely perfect! I bought it for my 15.4" Toshiba, worried it might not fit. The computer just BARELY fits, which is good, because I'd hate to carry a bag any bigger. It's got many pockets for pens, cell phone, makeup, etc. I love the sueded red lining. I showed it to friends and colleauges the day it arrived, and everyone raved. It's seriously the best deal(bought it here for $55) I was able to find after several days (hours on end) searching the net for the perfect fashionable laptop bag!
customer_reviews.author: J. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Stylish performer
customer_reviews.text: Super stylish bag. Sharp red lining and lots of internal compartments which keeps everything neat and organized. As mentioned by others, a downside is holding capacity of the bag. Extremely tight fit when adding a daytimer and some basic accessories (blackberry, writing instruments, etc.)plus a laptop. Overall, good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MDS

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I had been searching for a while to replace my wheeled computer bag with something for short trips. I absolutely love the look of the bag and it has plenty of room for my lap top and files. I only wish the handle were a little bit longer. Overall a great bag for the money!
customer_reviews.author: DJM

customer_reviews.title: Professional and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: This bag is beautiful. It is sturdy and very professional looking, and the croc pattern of the bag makes it stylish. Another plus is it has metal feet to protect the bottom of the bag. I highly recommend this item, even if you do not have a laptop computer. This bag would serve you well if all you ever did was use it as a professional tote for work.
customer_reviews.author: Bookwormette

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is just pefect! I purchased it for my Dell Inspiron 6400 and, although the fit was pretty snug, I am very pleased with the purchase. It is easy to carry and above everything else, is very stylish and professional.
customer_reviews.author: E. W.

customer_reviews.title: wonderful bag after many years it still looks decent
customer_reviews.text: wonderful bag after many years it still looks decent, many pockets inside, the only downfall is a bit heavy (not heavier than most analogue bags) so I had to stop wearing it after I broke my neck - love it
customer_reviews.author: Babylon2012

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop bag
customer_reviews.text: I searched and searched for several months before deciding on this laptop bag. I use it for school and work. It is big enough to carry my netbook (which is about 13"), cell phone, reading material, file folders, etc. Plus, there is extra padding inside for the laptop and an extra accessories bag for the smaller items. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: CUTE BAG
customer_reviews.text: I love my bad, it was the perfect size, with the perfect number of compartments inside...the only negative I can find is that it turns items placed in it, red...I'm trying to figure out a way to stop that
customer_reviews.author: Veneika

customer_reviews.title: Great tote!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It's sturdy, holds up well. Love the feet on the bottom, so the corners won't get worn out. Perfect choice for carrying my work and my little laptop.
customer_reviews.author: PKD

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: It looks very modern and professional at the same time. Perfect for the office, or school. Ideal to carry laptop and everything else that goes in a purse around without being bulky.
customer_reviews.author: blue88

customer_reviews.title: Great executive bag/laptop protector
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved her Valentine's gift. She claimed loving the look, the versatile pockets within and the computer protector. She is now able to take all her typical items along, protect her laptop, while looking chic.
customer_reviews.author: Yosemite lover

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this handbag as a Christmas gift for my wife. She and I had looked other handbags in local stores, but we did not find anything that we liked. When I saw this bag on Amazon, I liked it and ordered it just days before the 2009 Christmas. It came in time. She loves it very much and uses it to carry her laptop. The quality is super. Now she wants to upgrade her laptop to match this handbag!
customer_reviews.author: JJW

customer_reviews.title: Good item ..Worth for Money..
customer_reviews.text: This Bag is worth for that price..I am happy with this item..
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Best deal out there for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The bag is a great utility but could use some more elegance when looking at it from the top. Best value for this is on amazon - best buy had the same thing listed for $119.99
customer_reviews.author: Joe Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: With all the positive reviews I expected this to be a very nice bag. In my opinion, it is very cheap looking inside and out and it too large and cumbersome.....returned.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag. Its the small bag, but it's actually big. I wanted a smaller bag, but I'll keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Dchong

customer_reviews.title: good bag
customer_reviews.text: love the bag - small and compact for a laptop - has room to keep charger etc. Looks very stylish. I just bought it - so can't say about durability. But overall satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: caggar

customer_reviews.title: Classy Chic (mobile) Computer Bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look & design of this bag, but you can't put too much into it. There are nice compartments inside yet when I add my travel charger it's bulky & things don't seem to fit too good - even with my 13" laptop. Overall, it's cute & a good item thus far (it's ONLY been a month).
customer_reviews.author: J. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: very happy with the bag, fits my laptop very well, looks professional and slick, plenty of room inside for pretty much everything. A little heavy once my laptop is in but that is becuase my computer is a little heafty. overall I love it. definately a feel good bag with practical application.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Niki Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Loved it - until the red dye started to rub off on my things
customer_reviews.text: It's meant to carry a laptop. I love the design. The red interior looks great, but the color rubs off onto things that are plastic. My white earphones are stained and it doesn't look good. They look old and dirty now. My Kindle has a red cast on the edges, which actually looks a little bit cool. My lip gloss container is almost totally mauve now. It used to be white.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is wonderful. It looks to be of superb quality. I have not used the bag outside my home yet but I am using as a storage bag for my laptop. So far I have not had any problems with the bag. It looks and feels sturdy and it has an elegant design. I love the inside of the bag with its velvety feel and red interior.
customer_reviews.author: KarBel

customer_reviews.title: nice bag, practical stylish
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag so I could travel with my laptop. It's both stylish and practical. Fits my 14inch laptop nicely and looks nice. Also, as others have said, fits files and a book, plus phone, ipod and other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Ajbwashdc

customer_reviews.title: Great bag !!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag.At first i was worried that it looked big but it's very professional looking and the red inner lining makes it very stylish too.I get compliments anytime i carry it. I srongly recommend this bag
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a bag for my laptop for awhile. Most of them were too expensive for me. This one has a great price and looks very professional. I've had a lot of people compliment me on my cute bag since I started carrying it. It's perfect for taking my laptop back and forth from home to work every day. It is not too big, but has plenty of room for some papers and office supplies that I need to take with me. I highly recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Everything fits perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for what I needed it for. I just purchased an HP laptop and I wanted a "cute" bag that I could take to work and school. I searched high and low for fashionable bag at local electronics stores but they were bulky and they didn't look feminine enough for me. This bag is everything that I need it to be. It small, fashionable, and it fits my laptop and all of it accessories.
customer_reviews.author: J. Flaggs

customer_reviews.title: Seriously worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about spending almost 70$ on this bag, but when I recieved it I was so impressed. I really love this bag! Very well made!! The crocadile pattern is a lot more prominent than the picture shows, but I really like it. To be honest I shy away from croc patterns, but it really works with this bag! I have a 15.4 in. Gateway laptop and it fit perfectly in this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie C. Anthonisen

customer_reviews.title: nice bag
customer_reviews.text: It's well made, straps are durable and stitching looks to be well done. Holds alot too, laptop and a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca of Indiana

customer_reviews.title: great bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend who is a real estate agent. It was a birthday present. It was a larger than I expected. I have to say she loved her present and I liked it so much I'm thinking of buying one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: N. Epler

customer_reviews.title: Best Ba(n)g for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to carry a laptop and other assorted paperwork. The compartment for the computer is snug, but that's a benefit--no bouncing around. The styling is classic and the various storage pockets a real plus. You won't find a better bag for the money. Good looks, practical, suits this busy real estate agent to a "T". Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Diamond Lil

customer_reviews.title: Very sophisticated looking
customer_reviews.text: I love how this bag looks, it's the perfect bag for a professional. I work and go to school, so it's not a everyday bag for me because of its limited space. I can just get in my day minder, a notebook, laptop and the charger. and it does get a little heavy for my shoulders. But other then that its an awesome bag
customer_reviews.author: N. G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect computer bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is exactly what I was looking for: stylish, sleek, perfect size and padding for my laptop, and enough room/compartments for a spiral notebook, extra cables and a mouse. I would recommend this bag to anyone looking to replace a bulky nylon computer bag.
customer_reviews.author: MyFriendKokoro

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: The crocodile skin took a little while for me to get used just cuz it's not really my style, but the quality is excellent, and it's actually very stylish and sexy. I've received a lot of compliments on it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Laptop Tote
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It's larger than I expected from the photo, which is great. It's big enough to hold my laptop and several large law books. It looks classy and well-made. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: EKM

customer_reviews.title: Milano Small Laptop Bag is great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Milano Small laptop carry bag....very sturdy handles and just right for my small Macbook...
customer_reviews.author: NYC Buyer

customer_reviews.title: It looked different on the picture.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service, but I expected to see another model of the handbag. It looked different on the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Yuliya Tkacheva

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheap!!!
customer_reviews.text: The bag was not what I was expecting, and, furthermore, the retailer SUCKS in terms of their return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Bookworm

product_meta.title: Mobile Edge Women's 15.4" PC/ 17" Mac Small Milano Casual Handbag
product_meta.description:
The Milano is the pinnacle of elegance! Influenced by today's fashion runways, this faux-croc design will carry your computer in a style never before available!. It features a dedicated SafetyCell computer protection compartment for notebooks up to 15.4", our exclusive Wireless Security Shield pocket that inoculates your cell phone or PDA from data theft and viruses, a padded cell phone pocket, a zippered interior pocket and a removable cosmetics/accessory wristlet.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :16.5 x 4.5 x 12.5 inches; 10.58 Ounces
 * Item model number :MEMC1S
 * Department :Luggage
 * Date First Available :July 7, 2004
 * Manufacturer :Mobile Edge
 * ASIN :B000B88UF8

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank:  *  #50892 inLaptop Bags, Cases & Sleeves 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:3.7 out of 5 stars66 ratings The Milano is the pinnacle of elegance! Influenced by today's fashion runways, this faux-croc design will carry your computer in a style never before available!. It features a dedicated SafetyCell computer protection compartment for notebooks up to 15.4", our exclusive Wireless Security Shield pocket that inoculates your cell phone or PDA from data theft and viruses, a padded cell phone pocket, a zippered interior pocket and a removable cosmetics/accessory wristlet.
feature_bullets: Dedicated SafetyCell computer protection compartment fits laptops up to 15.4-Inch and 17-Inch Mac. Laptop compartment dimensions- 16-Inch x 2-Inch x 11-Inch
Exclusive Wireless Security Shield pocket protects cell phones from hackers and viruses
